setBPMInRange

public void setBPMInRange(int p)
Sets the bpm in a given range (used by progress bars) The bpm starts as 60 and each increase in the parameter increase the bpm by 6

Parameters:
p. - The bpm are calculated with 60 + 6 * p

Play

public void Play()
Starts the player

Stop

public void Stop()
Stops the player Also notifies all observers with a -1

IsPlaying

public boolean IsPlaying()
Method for seeing if the player is runing or not

Returns:
true if the player is running, else false
